title: Web-Based Interactive Dental Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic dental terminology and concepts
context.additional_context: Beginner dental education for in-service practitioners combining theory/practice with personalized device-based online modules

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles and interpretation methods of panoramic radiography with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze the spatial relationships of oral structures in three dimensions using a 3D anatomy atlas.
Learners can master basic restorative dentistry techniques through virtual cavity preparation simulation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
